text: António Francisco dos Santos (21 February 1948 - 11 September 2017) was a Roman Catholic bishop. He was ordain to the priesthood in 1972, dos served as auxiliary bishop of the Archbishop of Braga, Portugal, from 2004 to 2006. He then served as bishop of the Diocese of Aviero from 2006 to 2014 and as bishop of the Diocese of Porto from 2014 until his death.Diocese of Porto dos Santos died of a heart attack in Porto, Portugal on 11 September 2017 at the age of 69. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Portuguese Roman Catholic bishops
title: António Francisco dos Santos
